"U.S. high-yield bonds outstanding as of the first quarter of 2021
are estimated to be about $1.7 trillion, comprising about 16% of
the U.S. corporate bond market, which totals $10.7 trillion." -
podatek iz Q1 2021, tako da je danes drugace, tezko pa radikalno
drugace.

junk je vse, kar ni investment grade. investment grade je vse, kar
ima rating velikih bonitetnih his nad nekim pragom. svojcas je junk
pomenilo Baa ali nizje od moody's in BBB ali nizje od
s&p.

ne razumem, kaj tocno sprasujes v zadnjem delu.
